name: Anuj Gosalia
position: Co-founder & CEO at Terribly Tiny Tales

posts.title: A Changing World Order
posts.content: The world is changing at a feverish pace. Friends, colleagues and everyone engaged in knowledge work are beginning to sense this, including ...

posts.title: Indian v/s Australia
posts.content:
Think about it - this cricket series was akin to therapy. 

Laying our childhood trauma up top, working with it slowly and surely over two m...
